name: Tiny Atolls
description:
TINY ATOLLS is a minimalist building strategy game
Expand across colorful islands, unlock new tiles and complete quests!




TINY ATOLLS centers around the art of forging meaningful connections between different types and colors. The higher the number of connections you establish, the greater your score and the more tiles you can strategically position.

Beyond standard tiles, an assortment of card tools becomes at your disposal, offering the means to expand your diminutive settlements. As you unravel quests and amass points, you unlock the ability to select the precise tools required for venturing to new islands and reshaping the picturesque landscapes.



Some quests are special and will ask for specific tiles to be placed in order to build unique buildings with various new mechanics.




  • Procedurally generated islands
  • Quests and unlockable tiles
  • Beautiful, vibrant colors
  • Modular tiling
  • Calm and cozy atmosphere
  • Online leaderboard
